about_the_game:
Dive into the vibrant world of Voxel Bot, where you take control of an adorable cubicle robot on a mission to transform every cube into a brilliant purple! Navigate through a series of imaginative levels, hopping diagonally from cube to cube, as you tackle various challenges and obstacles that will keep you on your toes.

Game Features:

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Jump across a grid of cubes to change their colors. Your goal is to turn all cubes purple to complete each level. With 60 levels of increasing complexity, there's always a new challenge awaiting you!

  • Exciting Obstacles: Watch out for sneaky enemies that are eager to catch you! Stay alert and strategize your movements to avoid these pesky foes. And don’t forget the spikes—stay too long on a cube, and you might find yourself in a pinch!

  • Innovative Mechanics: Discover new cube mechanics as you progress! Unlock the power of the green cube, which gives you extended movement, and master the toggle cube that can switch between solid and non-solid states. These features add depth and excitement to your gameplay!

  • Casual Fun for Everyone: Voxel Bot is perfect for players of all ages. With its charming graphics and simple controls, anyone can enjoy hopping around the colorful cubes. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of video games, this title offers a fun, engaging experience that is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

  • Relaxing Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a soothing environment as you navigate through beautifully designed levels. The enjoyable soundtrack complements the relaxing gameplay, making Voxel Bot a delightful way to unwind.

Join the Voxel Bot adventure today and experience a unique blend of action and puzzle-solving! Can you clear all the cubes and master every level? Grab your copy now on Steam and jump into the fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz x 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: Voxel Bot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3450 @ 1.10GHz (cpu 2.2 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics (128 MB)
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio

short_description: In this game, the player controls a cubicle robot, who starts each game on a grid of cubes and moves by hopping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to purple allows the player to progress to the next stage.
